title: Web Framework Overview
description: A brief overview of the basic concepts of the Web Framework with links to in-depth documentation

title: Search managers
description: Search managers get data from Splunk and make it available to Web Framework components

title: Charts
description: Various chart types for plotting Splunk data

title: Tables
description: Table views for displaying Splunk data

title: Form
description: Various types of form controls

title: Search manager controls
description: Views that interact with and control search managers

title: Map
description: A map for displaying geographic Splunk data

title: Data template
description: A client-side component for rendering Splunk data in a template

title: How to use the Tookit visualizations
description: How to include the visualizations from this toolkit in your app

title: Sankey Chart
description: The Sankey Chart visualizes data flow between nodes

title: Bubble Chart
description: The Bubble Chart visualizes the magnitude of data values as circular areas

title: Force-Directed Graph
description: The Force-Directed Graph displays information about connectivity and clustering between nodes in a network

title: Calendar Heatmap
description: The Calendar Heatmap displays time-series data on a timeline as a heatmap

title: Parallel Sets
description: The Parallel Sets graph displays multidimensional categorical data

title: Parallel Coordinates
description: The Parallel Coordinates graph visualizes multidimensional data dynamically

title: Punchcard
description: The Punchcard shows a count relationship between two data dimensions

title: Sunburst
description: The Sunburst shows hierarchically-grouped data using a radial layout with the root at the center and the leaf nodes around the edges.

title: Example: Dashboard in JavaScript
description: An example showing a simple dashboard using JavaScript to create and connect the views and managers

title: Example: Saved reports
description: An example showing a SavedSearchManager to power multiple views

title: Example: Post-process searches
description: An example showing post-process searches

title: Example: Search properties
description: An example showing how to set search properties programatically

title: Example: Cached searches
description: An example showing how to use pre-existing jobs to power searches

title: Example: Data binding with tokens
description: An example showing how to set up data binding using tokens

title: Example: Form inputs with tokens
description: An example showing how to parameterize a search query using two tokens linked to form inputs

title: Example: Cascading form inputs
description: An example showing how to set up multiple form inputs, with the choice from one cascading into the others

title: Example: Multidropdown lists
description: An example showing how to use the MultiDropdown form input

title: Example: Search with timeline
description: An example showing how to create a UI that is similiar to Splunk Web by adding different views, such as the Timeline view

title: Example: Time ranges
description: An example showing how to set up a TimeRange view using simple Django template tags with no custom code

title: Example: Grouped time ranges
description: An example showing a TimeRange view that sets the timebounds for two searches that drive two Single views

title: Example: Punchcard with a searchbar
description: An example showing a toolkit visualization attached to a searchbar

title: Example: Interactive views
description: An example showing how to use click events to update searches and views on a page

title: Example: Chart click events
description: An example showing how to customize the drilldown action on a chart

title: Example: Custom table cells
description: An example showing how to set up a custom table cell renderer to display an icon based on the severity value in each row

title: Example: Custom table row expander
description: An example showing how to add custom row expander to a table

title: Example: Complex dashboard with drilldown
description: An example showing airlines data in a complex dashboard using multiple views, token binding, events, and in-page drilldown

title: Example: NVD3 charts
description: An example showing how to use the NVD3 charts to display data in different ways

title: Example: JSON results viewer
description: An example showing how to write a custom view that simply displays Splunk data in JSON format

title: Example: Basic layout template using JavaScript
description: An example and reusable template for dashboard layout using JavaScript

title: How to use the Splunk Dev CLI
description: An explanation of how to set up and use the Splunk developer command line interface (CLI) tool
